text: do you want to optimize costs improve
agent productivity and enhance your
customer experience chatbots and virtual
assistance powered by AWS Solutions and
services let you easily build powerful
Omni Channel self-service Solutions with
the right controls and transparency to
ensure safe contextual responses while
also allowing you to automate repetitive
tasks 24 hours a day 365 days of the
year let's say a customer has a question
regarding a company's Insurance products
once a customer asks the question via
chat the AI analyzes the question to
understand customer intent next natural
language understanding and Foundation
models generate a contextual response in
real time that points only to your
company's trusted and approved knowledge
sources as the conversation continues
the previous dialogue is used to
maintain context and seamlessly answer
follow-up questions to support customers
over the phone these generative AI
capabilities can help clients build
conversational interactive voice
response systems that can even include
user identification and voice
verification hello welcome to Octan
insurance I see that you're calling from
0100 can you please verify your
five-digit zip code uh yes it's 1 2 3 4
5 thank you Carla in a few words let me
know how I can help you I just bought my
first home do you offer home insurance
yes we we offer home insurance policies
that provide customized coverage
tailored to your specific needs and
risks I'm interested in that can you
describe it in more detail please sure
our home insurance policies consider
factors like your home square footage
construction type roof age and more as
well as your individual priorities and
concerns that sounds great sign me up
okay you will receive an email to your
registered email address with a summary
of our conversation and a form to sign
up for home insurance
